content: Thanks for sharing your list. I read “Thinking, Fast and Slow” some time ago, but I would like to re-read becasue I have recently found another book called “The unding project” by Michael Lewis. I haven’t finished it yet, the story about backgound of Daniel Kahneman’s work with Amos Tversky. How “Thinking, Fast and Slow” was written… It IS interesting book, too. I recommed after you finish “Thinking, Fast and Slow.”
